sections.content: Construction of a new $54.5 million sports facility in Fitzroy has begun – delivering Australia's first multi-use vertical indoor sports centre.
Designed by [Co.Op Studio](https://co-opstudio.com.au/), the Fitzroy Gasworks Sports Centre will house:

Its location adjacent to [Wurun Senior Campus](https://wurunseniorcampus.vic.edu.au/) will allow integration between the sports centre and the school's indoor sports courts, creating a six-court facility to operate outside school hours.
The Victorian government and Yarra City Council are funding the project, and [Built Environs](https://www.builtenvirons.com.au/) has been appointed as the head contractor.
